p: An affective sensory test of attributes was conducted at 1 and 7 d of storage to measure the level satisfaction of 30 consumers. Each consumer evaluated two chorizo slices (6 mm thickness) chosen at random. Samples for evaluation were maintained at 4°C and were presented on plastic Petri dishes. The attributes evaluated were red color, oregano odor, appearance, smoothness, and overall acceptability. A 7‐point hedonic scale was used in this test, where 7 = liked very much and 1 = disliked very much (Anzaldúa‐Morales, 1994; Meilgaard, Civille, & Carr, 2006).
